title: BTS In the SOOP
overview: BTS In the SOOP is an entertainment show, which is about BTS resting in the forest. It focuses on the BTS' daily life and relaxation, where each members will spend an ordinary time doing things outside the stage. The members plan time tables for the day and spend time solely among themselves surrounded by a wide river and a dense forest. They take the lead without communicating with the production crew and show their natural selves while spending their time separately and together.
